resources.string: If you are female, you must:\nBe healthy and feeling well\nBe at least 18 years.
If you are male, you must:\nBe healthy and feeling well\nBe at least 18 years.

Giving blood saves lives. The blood you give is a lifeline in an emergency and for people who need long-term treatments. Many people would not be alive today if donors had not generously given their blood. Most people between ages of 17-65 are able to give blood. That is why we need more young people to start giving blood .
